description:
"It`s been a while..." Sakaki smirks fearlessly. He and Kakeru are old acquaintances.
Kakeru is unable to hide how shaken he is by their unexpected reunion.
Swirling inside Kakeru was the loneliness he experienced as a high school student due to his talents.
Kakeru runs as though fleeing from shadows, when before him appears "the other Kakeru."
It is the desperate man he used to be before he met Haiji. Kakeru glares resentfully at his past.
Just as he`s about to lose hope in himself, someone with a kind voice reaches out to him.
It`s Prince and his friends...
Source: crunchyroll
